description.diamond-pearl:
The user vibrates its
wings to generate a
damaging sound wave.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
